summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 20300, entitled "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of Navy View Place, First Avenue Northwest, Greenwood Avenue and North Forty-second Street, across Terrace Hill Addition, an unrecorded plat, lying in the North One-half (N 1/2) of the Northeast Quarter (N. E. 1/4) of the Southeast Quarter (S. E. 1/4) of the Northeast Quarter (N. E. 1/4) of Section Thirteen (13), Township Twenty-five (25 N.) Range Three (3) East, W. M.; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law," approved March 2, 1909, and authorizing the dismissal of the action in the Superior Court based upon said Ordinance.
